Brief Description: Phylogenetic Generalised Linear Mixed Model for ecological community data (e.g., species composition across sites; bipartite interactions)
Correlations among multiple traits with phylogenetic signal
`pglmm` tailored for comparative data in which species (tips of a phylogeny) only occur once
Pairwise phylogenetic beta diversity of communities
Convert a phylogeny to a var-cov matrix, a faster version of `ape::vcv`
